contents: Article 18 (Deliberation Procedure) ① The term of office of directors (excluding members of the International Olympic Committee, secretary-general and athlete representatives in the case of the Sports Council) shall be 4 years, and the term of office of auditors shall be 2 years, and may be reappointed only once. there is. However, exceptions are made in cases where the committee has deliberated in accordance with the following items. Revised on January 24, 2022. 1. When executive experience is required when advancing to an executive position in an international sports organization. 2. When the contribution is clear as a result of quantifying and evaluating indicators such as financial contribution, performance in major international competitions, and group evaluations. ② To be appointed as an executive. A person who intends to become the president of each organization must complete deliberation or re-deliberation in accordance with Article 20 before the candidate registration period. Revised on January 24, 2022. ③ The Committee is a re-deliberation body for the deliberation of executives of city/provincial sports organizations and makes final deliberations and resolution on the deliberation of executives of city/provincial sports organizations. ④ The documents that a person who wishes to undergo deliberation pursuant to paragraph (1) must submit through the member sports organization and the member city/provincial sports association are as follows. Revised 2022. 1. 24. 1. Application for executive deliberation 2. Resume 3.
